summary: COMPLETE E2E TEST SUCCESSFUL! All core user journey features working: Registration -> Auto-login -> Dashboard (100 coins) -> Browse (6 talents) -> Talent Profile (4 services) -> Service Selection -> Booking Modal -> Booking Creation. Email confirmation is NOW DISABLED and registration works seamlessly.

minor.issue: Dashboard sub-pages not implemented - 404 errors when navigating from sidebar

issues: Sidebar links (Favorites, Bookings, Wallet, Profile, Settings) lead to 404 pages - pages not yet implemented

action_items: OPTIONAL: Implement dashboard sub-pages (profile, settings, wallet, favorites, bookings list)
critical_code_review_comments: Registration flow works perfectly with email confirmation disabled
Supabase trigger correctly creates profile with 'client' role and wallet with 100 coins
All 6 demo talents display correctly with proper data
Booking creation works and redirects to booking detail page
Payment flow shows 'Payment Pending' status correctly

test_credentials.note: User successfully registered and completed full booking flow

seed_data_creation: 6 demo talents with services already seeded in Supabase
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. Email confirmation is DISABLED. Registration creates user with 100 coins. 6 talents available at /dashboard/browse. Booking flow complete. Minor: Some dashboard sub-pages (profile, settings, wallet, favorites) return 404 - not yet implemented.

verified_working.registration: User registration with Client role - auto-redirects to dashboard
verified_working.auto_login: After registration, user is automatically logged in
verified_working.dashboard: Shows 100 coins balance, 4 featured talents, welcome message with user name
verified_working.browse_talents: 6 talents displayed with locations (Lagos, Abuja, Port Harcourt, Kano, Enugu), status badges, prices
verified_working.talent_profile: Profile page shows talent info, 4 services with prices, gallery
verified_working.service_selection: Can select services, shows total price, Book Now button appears
verified_working.booking_modal: Modal shows selected services, date/time inputs, wallet balance (100 coins), Confirm & Pay button
verified_working.booking_creation: Booking created successfully, redirects to booking detail page
verified_working.booking_detail: Shows booking ID, Payment Pending status, talent info, scheduled date/time, services, total, Pay button, Cancel option
